2054.subject: HPWE
2054.descrlong: A theory and practical based course addressing core concepts of both health and wellness, the interrelationship and benefits of physical fitness, proper nutrition, and effective stress management. This section gives additional emphasis on nutritional understanding and students' actual eating decisions. Learning experiences include self-assessments, development and implementation of personal wellness goals/plans/actions, and self-reflection on consequences of lifestyle choices. (Offered every semester.)
